plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Bunnies like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐇 Bunnies love to munch on me!

additionalData.altText: A simple riddle about a carrot.

plant.question: I have a stem, and pretty colors. Sometimes people give me as a gift. What am I?

additionalData.altText: A simple riddle about a flower.

plant.question: I am big and tall and have green leaves. Birds like to make nests in me. What am I?

additionalData.altText: A simple riddle about a tree.

plant.question: I am a long, yellow fruit. Monkeys like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🙊 Monkeys peel me before they eat me.
🌴 I grow on trees in warm places.

additionalData.altText: A simple riddle about a banana.

plant.question: I'm red, round, and yummy. I grow on a vine. What am I?

hints.text: 🍅 I'm juicy and grow in gardens.
🪴 I need lots of sun to grow.

additionalData.altText: A simple riddle about a tomato.

plant.question: I am small and green and grow in a garden. You can eat me in a salad. What am I?

additionalData.altText: A simple riddle about a lettuce.

plant.question: I have a brown trunk and green leaves. I grow very tall. What am I?

hints.text: 🍂 My leaves change color in the fall.
🧭 People can make houses out of me.

additionalData.altText: A slightly more complex riddle about a tree.

plant.question: I grow underground and have a brown or red skin. You can mash me and eat me for dinner. What am I?

hints.text: 🍟 People can make french fries with me.

additionalData.altText: A slightly more complex riddle about a potato.

plant.question: I have sharp thorns and a beautiful smell. I come in many colors and have petals. What am I?

hints.text: 🌹 I'm often given as a sign of love.
🥀 I need sun and water to grow.

additionalData.altText: A slightly more complex riddle about a rose.

plant.question: I am a big fruit with a green rind. Inside, I am red and have black seeds. What am I?

hints.text: 🍉 I am very juicy and refreshing.
☀️ I am perfect for a hot summer day.
🔪 People cut me into slices to eat me.

additionalData.altText: A complex riddle about a watermelon.

transport.question: I go beep beep! I have wheels and take you places. What am I?

hints.text: 🎶 You can sing songs in me.

transport.question: I go choo choo! I ride on tracks. What am I?
I float on the water. I can take you on a trip across the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I am bigger than a bathtub toy.
⚓ I need an anchor to stay still.

transport.question: I fly in the sky! I have wings and take you far away. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I am faster than a car.
✈️ People travel in me to different countries.
🌍 I take off from an airport.

transport.question: I can carry many people at once. I stop at bus stops. What am I?

hints.text: 🧑‍🤝‍🧑 Many children take me to school
🚌 I am bigger than a car but smaller than a train.

transport.question: I have two wheels, and you pedal me to go. What am I?

hints.text: 👧 You can use your legs to make me move.
🔔 I have a bell to ring.
🏞️ You can ride me in a park.

transport.question: I help build tall buildings. I can scoop and lift things. What am I?

hints.text: 👷 You see me at construction sites.
💪 I am very strong and lift heavy things.

transport.question: I have a siren and flashing lights. I help people who are hurt. What am I?

hints.text: 🚨 I am usually white and red.
🚑 I take people to the hospital.

transport.question: I zoom through space! I can take astronauts to the moon! What am I?

hints.text: 🌙 I go very, very far away.

transport.question: I help put out fires. I have a big ladder and a hose. What am I?
